text:
yu#ShmantaH saqhaBa#kShAH syAma || 
viSvE# dEqvA maqrutaq indrO# aqsmAnaqsmin dviqtIyEq sava#nEq na ja#hyuH | 
Ayu#ShmantaH priqyamE#ShAqM ~Mvada#ntO vaqyaM dEqvAnA(gm)# sumaqtau syA#ma || 
iqdaM tRuqtIyaq(gm)q sava#naM kavIqnAmRuqtEnaq yE ca#maqsamaira#yanta | 
tE sau#dhanvaqnAH suva#rAnaSAqnAH svi#ShTiM nO aqBi vasI#yO nayantu || 
Aqyata#navatIqrvA aqnyA Ahu#tayO hUqyantE#&nAyataqnA aqnyA yA A#GAqrava#tIqstA Aqyatana#vatIqryAH - [  ]   27
